metadata.title: CVE-2021-30518 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Reader Mode in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.212allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
